column5: Im sure some of you have seen the posters all over the Grey/Bruce area in the efforts to locate Dave Billings.. http://www.owensoundsuntimes.com/ArticleDisplay.aspx?e=3517743  Condolences to his family and friends
Sad times indeed for the family.Depression is an insidious killer that remains unrecognized for years in many. Condolences to the family and friends.
Condolences to the family.  I had to read it a couple times, at first it made no sense,  the vehicle colour description made it sound like it had been burned.
